subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Spurs’ first-round predicament showcases an aging roster, but management says they will not consider trading any of the star trio of Tim Duncan, Manu Ginobili and Tony Parker.
snippet: The Spurs’ first-round predicament showcases an aging roster, but management says they will not consider trading any of the star trio of Tim Duncan, Manu Ginobili and Tony Parker.
